tasks.title: Convert tests in distributed/protocol.rs to proptest
tasks.description: Rewrite all tests in src/distributed/protocol.rs to use proptest for property-based testing instead of the current test implementation. Each test should be converted to use proptest's property testing macros and generators.
tasks.details:

The file src/distributed/protocol.rs contains tests that need to be converted to use proptest for comprehensive property-based testing. We need to convert all existing tests to use proptest for better test coverage and more thorough testing.

- Convert all #[test] and #[tokio::test] functions to use proptest
